description.en:
‘Berserker Bartz’, a legendary solo player of Arpedia Online, had his character hacked and deleted one day.

"Damn it. No way I'm giving up! I don't know who you are, but I'm going to find you and crush you!"

Having lost the character he put his all into, Kang YuHan creates 'Zigg', a blacksmith with the sole mission of finding the hacker!

Can YuHan find the hacker who deleted Bartz?
Follow Zigg's action-packed adventure to become the greatest blacksmith!

The strongest hero of humanity, Kim Sung Bin.

He threw everything on the line and fought… but he still couldn’t prevent the destruction of the world.

However, his legend has just begun as he returns 20 years into the past.

“I’ll definitely… kill it this time.”

Now fully equipped with overwhelming power and experience, the hero’s raid isn’t over yet!
description.ko:
인류 최강의 영웅, 김성인
모든 것을 내던지며 분투했지만
결국…… 세상의 멸망은 막지 못했다

하지만 그의 전설은 이제 시작이었으니
성인, 20년 전으로 회귀하다!

“이번에는…… 반드시 잡는다.”

압도적인 재능과 경험으로 무장한 완전체
영웅의 레이드는 아직 끝나지 않았다!
description.ru: Сильнейший герой человечества Ким Сон Бин. Он бросил все на кон и сражался, но… не cмог предотвратить разрушение мира. Однако его легенда только начинается, когда Сон Бин возвращается на 20 лет в прошлое.
description.pt-br:
O herói mais forte da humanidade, Kim Sung Bin.

Ele jogou tudo na linha e lutou... mas ele ainda não conseguiu impedir a destruição do mundo.

No entanto, sua lenda apenas começou quando ele retorna 20 anos no passado.

"Com certeza... vou matá-lo desta vez."

Agora totalmente equipado com poder e experiência esmagadores, o ataque do herói ainda não acabou!

altTitles.fr: Le chevalier de la fleur glacée

altTitles.es: Caballero de la flor de invierno

description.en:
Julia, who possesed great swordsmanship, was killed after being used by the man she loved. Her only crime was having lived a life with an ugly face due to a curse… Right before her death, she witnessed her curse lifting before returning to the past. Now, she’s sworn to live her life for herself.

---
Yulia von Rosenthal gave everything she had to serve her liege and love, Emperor Leonard, but she was rewarded with betrayal and death because of her "ugly" appearance, the result of an age-long family curse. Just when she thinks everything is over, Yulia finds herself alive, eight years before her death. Determined not to repeat her past mistakes, she ventures out on a journey to break her curse and become stronger. The question is, will that be enough for Yulia to escape Leonard's clutches?

---

뛰어난 검술을 지닌 율리아는 사랑했던 남자에게 이용당하다 살해된다.
그저 저주로 인해 추악한 얼굴로 살아갔을 뿐이었는데….

죽음을 앞둔 순간,
저주가 풀리는 것을 목격하며 과거로 회귀한 그녀.
이제는 자신만을 위해 살아가리라 다짐한다.

Мечница Юлия всю жизнь жила с уродливым лицом из-за проклятия. Однажды мужчина, которого она любила, убивает её, и на пороге смерти Юлия наблюдает, как снимается её проклятие... Она возвращается в прошлое и клянется жить полной жизнью.

title.en: Otoge ni Trip shita Ore ♂ Reload

altTitles.ja: 乙ゲーにトリップした俺♂リロード

altTitles.en: I ♂ Tripped into an Otome Game Reloaded

description.en:
Otoya Otonari is a university student who moved to the world of Otome games by chance. He has a trouble with the characters who are boldly setting up love events even though they know he's a man, but he gets a normal ending and is living a peaceful life.

Then, a support character suggested to him that he should try (the game) again...! A business love comedy that unfolds in a different world! I'll start dancing again...

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen
Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan

altTitles.es-la: El hijo menor del maestro de la espada

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)
description.ko:
진 룬칸델
대륙 최고의 검술명가, 룬칸델의 막내아들
룬칸델 역사상 최악의 둔재

비참하게 쫓겨나 허무한 최후를 맞이한 그에게
다시 한 번 기회가 주어졌다.

“너는 이 힘을 어떻게 사용하고 싶더냐?”
“저를 위해 사용하고 싶습니다.”

전생의 기억과 압도적인 재능, 그리고 신과의 계약

최강이 될 준비는 끝났다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)

description.en: A spin-off gag manga of “Kaiju No. 8”! The defense force members risk their lives to protect people from approaching monsters. But even these members have “off-duty” days to relieve their daily fatigue! Don’t miss the hilarious vacations the members of the force have to offer!

altTitles.ja: ひきこまり吸血姫の悶々

altTitles.th: สารพันปัญหาวุ่นวาย ของยัยแวมไพร์ขี้จุ๊

altTitles.en: The Vexations of a Shut-In Vampire Princess

description.en:
“…Fueh? W-What is it?”

When the shut-in girl Terakomari, or Komari for short, woke up from her slumber, she had been appointed as a commander! And if that wasn’t enough, the corps she holds responsibility over is known for overthrowing and murdering their superiors! Even though she had been born into a prestigious vampire family, because she can’t drink any blood, she possesses close to no athletic or physical abilities, she’s rather small for her age, and she can’t even use any magic.

Met with endless despair, her trusted (?) maid Vill comes to the rescue.

“Please leave it to me, Komari-sama. I will definitely make sure you won’t be found out!”

Thus begins the comical fantasy portraying Komari’s struggles. She’s a shut-in, but she can actually do it if she puts her mind to it!?

The Popular Novel is now in Manga form!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/the-vexations-of-a-shut-in-vampire-princess-manga/665/)

title.en: HUNTER x HUNTER - DIGITAL COLORED COMICS

altTitles.en: Hunter x Hunter - Digital Colored Comics

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Hunter x Hunter". Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティー辞めます。

altTitles.en: I Quit the Party of the Brave.

description.en:
There was once a party who sought to defeat the Demon Lord and save the world, the Hero's Party. However, tired of the Hero's Party unwillingness to go directly after the Demon Lord, the Ashen Wizard Raniel quit the Hero's Party and returned to his hometown to meet with his master. There, he was recommended a position as an assistant professor at a prestigious academy.

_"Why are you so bad at this? Just make circuits, cover yourself in mana, and use it."_

However, a genius like him didn't seem to have any aptitude for teaching others...

---

Note: This is based on a Korean novel.

[Official Japanese release](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/148780)

[Official French release](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/1483)

Lee Gi-Ho is trying to earn his tuition through the popular VR game Circuit, but things just aren't going his way. However, right when he decides to throw in the towel, he gets a lucky break that changes everything!

Fortune leads him ever deeper into the game’s lore, and before he knows it, Gi-Ho finds himself stocked up with powerful items chasing an elusive group of mysterious warriors. 

But to unlock his true powers, Giho must learn the secrets of this group before his luck runs out for good.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vvOZs-a5I-s)
description.ko:
내 삶에서 그렇게 터지지 않던 운빨이
게임을 접기 직전, 단 한 방에 터졌다!

세계 최초 가상현실 게임 <서킷>에서 인생 역전하려던 이기호,
4억 명의 플레이어 중 그 누구도 손에 넣지 못한 레어 아이템이
그의 손에 들어왔다!

"이런 게 진짜 인생역전 아니냐!"

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vvOZs-a5I-s)

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.th: พี่ชายสายบอดี้การ์ด

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

欺负我妹的一个都不准跑！

description.en:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?

altTitles.en: The Heavenly Demon Can't Live a Normal Life
The Reincarnation of the Dark Master

altTitles.uk: Небесний демон не може жити нормальним життям

altTitles.pt-br: O Demônio Celestial não pode viver uma Vida Normal

altTitles.es-la: El demonio celestial no puede llevar una vida normal

description.en:
“Is this a mission I was sent on by the gods? Or is this just divine punishment?”

Baek Jung-hyeok, the Heavenly Demon of Murim, finds that he’s been reincarnated into the body of Roman Dimitri, the dim-witted son of a baron who’s obsessed with the luxuries of the aristocratic lifestyle. But with his new status, Jung-hyeok is ready to shake things up on the continent of Salamander.

Will the divine demon accomplish what he’s set out to do? And will he finally get the answers to this mysterious reincarnation?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ko:
천마 백중혁, 드미트리 가문의 장남으로 눈을 뜨다.
드미트리의 얼간이, 차남에게 밀린 장남.
세간의 평판은 중요하지 않다.
천마, 아니, 로만 드미트리는 앞으로 평범하게 살 수 없다.
압도하는 천마 판타지!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ru:
Демон Пэк Чун Хёк.
Некогда сильнейшая личность в Муриме умирает и обнаруживает себя в теле старшего сына дома Дмитрий. В теле человека, которого все называют дураком. Человека, который постоянно находится в тени своего младшего брата и которому глубоко плевать на мнение окружающих.
Но теперь, демон... Нет, Роман Дмитрий больше не сможет жить привычной жизнью.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.uk: "Це місія, на яку мене послали боги? Чи це просто божественна кара?" Пек Чжун Хьок, божественний демон, повелитель Муріма, виявляє, що він реінкарнувався в тіло Романа Дмитровича, недоумкуватого сина барона, одержимого розкішшю аристократичного способу життя. Але з новим статусом Чжун Хьок готовий перевернути все на континенті Саламандр. Чи вдасться божественному демону досягти того, що він задумав? І чи отримає він нарешті відповіді на загадки цього таємничого перевтілення?
description.zh:
最强教主重生成异国废柴！
天不亡我！今生注定不凡！
武林最强天魔神教教主白钟赫生命自然终结后再睁眼发现自己成为了卢曼·德米特里，德米特里公认的傻子，且不如弟弟的德米特里长子。但外人的评价已经不重要。从此卢曼将不再浑浑噩噩，他的生活将会发生天翻地覆的变化，卢曼注定不再平凡！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.pt-br:
“O Demônio Celestial” Baek Joong-Hyuk abre os olhos como o filho mais velho da família Dimitry. Conhecido como o idiota da família, deixado de lado por causa do segundo filho. A opinião do mundo é irrelevante. “Demônio Celestial”, não, Roman Dimitry, não pode viver uma vida normal.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)

description.en:
For as long as she’s known, Miwa’s been into women - and now she’s at university, it might finally be time for her to come out of her straight-passing shell. Of course, that takes a lot of confidence, and coming out is never easy - but could Saeko, her trashy popular weirdo of a friend, give her the help she needs - or just maybe, could the two of them be more alike than Miwa realises…?!  
  
This series is a reimagining of tmfly’s earlier work of the same name.

description.zh: 漫画简介: 【KK原创投稿计划】 翎陌，最为奥莱兽人的他也是奥莱的原住民，不知为何原因离开了安防部开了一家咖啡馆。从而认识了脏爪、咕浅等好友。 谁又知晓，作为同窗的好友煜莱会背叛并加入了林达制药。精心策划了一起阴谋，乃至导致了一场灾难的发生。

title.en: Destroy It All And Love Me In Hell!

altTitles.ja: ぜんぶ壊して地獄で愛して

description.en:
Kurumi Yoshizawa, the student council president, has excellent grades and an inviting, friendly personality… on the surface at least. In reality, her days are spent struggling against her domineering mother and agonizing over her teachers’ expectations.

One day, Kurumi reluctantly goes to meet Naoi, her truant classmate, at her homeroom teacher’s request to look after her. The situation sours quickly as Naoi sees through Kurumi’s facade and makes her animosity clear. On the verge of a meltdown, Kurumi is barely able to stop herself from shoplifting, unaware that she’s being recorded by Naoi…

This is a violent story about two young girls struggling every day with no escape.
description.pl:
Kurumi Yoshizawa, przewodnicząca samorządu uczniowskiego, otwarta, ambitna, życzliwa... a przynajmniej na taką się kreuje. Rzeczywistość wygląda jednak mniej rózowo - w szkole musi zmagać się z nadmiernymi oczekiwaniami nauczycieli, a w domu czeka na nią toksyczna matka.

Pewnego dnia Kurumi, na prośbę wychowawcy, udaje się do Naoi, swojej wagarującej koleżanki z klasy. Sprawy przybierają zupełnie niespodziewany obrót, gdy Naoi dostrzega fasadę Kurumi i jasno wyraża swoją wrogość wobec niej. Będąc na skraju załamania nerwowego, Kurumi powstanawia dokonać drobnej kradzieży, przed czym w ostatniej chwili się powstrzymuje. Nie ma pojęcia, że całe te zajście nagrała Naoi.

To brutalna opowieść o dwóch młodych dziewczynach, które każdego dnia zmagają się z codziennością, od której nie mogą się wyrwać.
description.uk:
Вітайте, Йошізава Курумі – відмінниця, розумниця, красуня, президент школи та просто дуже гарна дівчинка!.. Принаймні такою вона себе показує людям. Реальність прозаїчніша: жорстокі методи виховання матері, відсутність будь-якого вільного часу, море стресу та щира відраза до всіх навколо.
І як часто буває з такими «відмінницями» – накипіло. «Що, якщо я це вкраду? Мене спіймають? Може, тоді цей жах нарешті скінчиться?» – стоїть і думає Курумі, не усвідомлюючи, що її спроба крадіжки записується на відео. Проте її знімають не камери відеоспостереження крамниці, а телефон Наой.
Наой – це дівчина, яка за словами не слідкує, до школи не ходить та обожнює ставити «відмінниць» на місце. Вона бачить абсолютно все крізь маску Курумі, погрожуючи показати відео однокласникам. Для Наой це був хіба що спосіб розвіяти нудьгу та провчити лицемірку… Допоки вона не починає бачити в Курумі лиш одне, але чисте та справжнє спільне бажання.

description.en: Fujiyama Shinobu aka Sexy Fujiyama, is a general working for the evil Flower Bud Gang who are trying to take over the city. Standing in her way is the masked magical girl, Princess Mamu, who wouldn't you know it, has just moved in next door to Fujiyama's place...

altTitles.zh: 想不通可爱老婆为什么要与我结婚

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng bùtōng kě'ài lǎopó wèishéme yào yǔ wǒ jiéhūn

description.en: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
description.ja: ウチのかわいすぎる妻は、なぜ超平凡な自分と結婚したのか――!?　自己評価激低な夫・槌岡直継は、妻・憙乃への疑念から“マリッジグレー”に陥っていた！　一方の憙乃は、日々溢れまくる直継へのLOVEを抑えるのに一生懸命で…!?　相思相愛な新婚夫婦の、激甘かけ違いラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: Minha esposa é muito suspeita! Eu não entendo por que ela se casou com alguém como eu? Por que uma mulher bonita, inteligente, e considerada como a Yoshino se casaria com alguém comum como Naotsugu!! Não há casamento azul aqui, apenas um suspeito caso de casamento cinza!!

description.en:
Lee Seohyun is the #1-ranked player in the long-forgotten game Asura Online. As he wonders why no one plays anymore, he stumbles upon the hottest new game, Asrian Online.

Based on the world of Asura, with similar maps and characters, becoming the best in Asrian should be a piece of cake. But after he picks his hidden class, he learns he has become a puny supporting character!

Though Seohyun has his sights set on becoming a star again, the only way to the top this time will be as a supporter!
description.pt-br:
Top ranker do jogo esquecido por todos, "Asra", SeoHyun retornou para dominar o novo jogo de realidade virtual baseado no Asra, "Asrian"!

Mas quando ele escolheu sua classe, ele pensou que seria um causador de dano...

[Parabéns! Você escolheu uma classe secreta, "Suporte"!]

E no fim das contas, acabou virando o melhor suporte!

Esse é só o início da jogatina revolucionária de SeoHyun!

title.en: Disney Twisted Wonderland - The Comic - ~Episode of Savanaclaw~

description.en: Hirasaka Yuuka, a high-school student who lived an average life, and a black carriage that suddenly appeared in front of her one day on her way home from club. After seeing it and losing consciousness, she awoke in another world called "Twisted Wonderland"...?

Beginning of the 13th century, Western Xia state in Chinese mainland. 
In those days existed a woman warrior named Shut Hell, the Evil One, feared even by the Mongols, reputed the strongest army in history. 
At first she was just a normal Tangut soldier, but after coming close to death so many times she found a superhuman strength in herself. 
On the other side Yurul, a young Mongol prince, is fascinated by the Tangut, his enemies' writing script, and is worried for their future…
Centuries later a Japanese high school student named Shudo is haunted by a vivid dream of a battlefield...
Is there some sort of bound between these completely different lives ? Will they manage to overcome the obstacles surrounding them ?


- **2012 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize (New Creator) winner**
description.pt-br: Um Jovem chamado Sudou desperta em uma de suas vidas passadas onde ele era uma guerreira Xia chamada Shut Hell a maligna, temida até pelos Mongóis de Genghis Khan que estão unindo forças para acabar com a dinastia Xia Ocidental. a história ocorre no Século 13 onde a Maligna junto com a principe Yurul se esforçam para preservar Xia e sua cultura e escritas.

description.en:
Beings from a different dimension have started a war with mankind. To counter this threat, an academy called "Genetics" that trains female warriors called "Pandora," who can wield special weaponry and armor, was formed. Kazuya Aoi decided to enroll in this school because of a promise with his sister, an outstanding alumnus who died in battle. There he meets second year Satellizer L. Bridgette, nicknamed "The Untouchable Queen" due to her solitary demeanor but also top of her class whose battle simulation streak is undefeated, until he came… and slowly changed her.  
  
The Prequels gives back story to several characters; does not effect the main story.  
  
Most FTH and all LetItGo are joint with Vexed Scans.

There were 33 volumes when the series went on hiatus, however, the site producing the chapters is still ongoing.

title.en: The Person I Met In-Game Was Actually My Big Sister.

altTitles.ja: ゲーム内で知り合った人が実は姉弟だった

altTitles.ja-ro: Game Nai de Shiriatta Hito ga Jitsu wa Kyoudai datta

altTitles.en: The Person I met in the game was actually My Big Sister.

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

description.en:
Nature made Ash Lynx beautiful; nurture made him a cold ruthless killer. A runaway brought up as the adopted heir and sex toy of "Papa" Dino Golzine, Ash, now at the rebellious age of seventeen, forsakes the kingdom held out by the devil who raised him. But the hideous secret that drove Ash's older brother mad in Vietnam has suddenly fallen into Papa's insatiably ambitious hands—and it's exactly the wrong time for Eiji Okamura, a pure-hearted young photographer from Japan, to make Ash Lynx's acquaintance…  

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/banana-fish)
  
---
Link:  
[ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20197) (anime)
description.tr: Tanrı, Ash Lynx’i güzeller güzeli bir çocuk olarak yarattı; dünya onu soğukkanlı acımasız bir katil haline getirdi. Çocuk yaşta evden kaçan Ash, “Baba” Dino Golzine tarafından bulunur ve hem mafyanın varisi olarak hem de Golzine’nin şahsi zevklerini tatmin etmek üzere yetiştirilir. Şimdi 17 yaşında isyankar bir genç olan Ash kendisini yetiştiren şeytanın ona sunduğu krallığa sırtını döner. Ancak Ash’in ağabeyinin Vietnam’da aklını yitirmesine sebep olan korkunç sır, hırsı dur durak bilmeyen Golzine’nin ellerine düşmüştür. İşte tam bu sırada genç bir fotoğrafçı Japonya’dan New York’a gelir. Temiz kalpli Eiji Okumura ve Ash Lynx olabilecek en talihsiz zamanda karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: A natureza fez Ash Lynx um cara bonito; mas o tempo fez dele um assassino cruel e frívolo. Uma criança fugitiva criada como um herdeiro adotado, um guerreiro treinado, e o brinquedo sexual de seu “Papa”, Dino Golzine, o senhor do crime da Costa do Oeste Oriental. Ash está agora na idade rebelde dos dezessete anos – abandonando o reino de poder e riqueza, realizada pelo demônio que o ressuscitou, preferindo um código para viver entre um pequeno, mas fiel, gangue de bandidos de rua. Porém, “Papa” não pode simplesmente deixá-lo ir. Não quando descobre que o segredo que levou o irmão mais velho de Ash a loucura, no Vietnã, poderá cair em suas mãos insaciavelmente ambiciosas. É exatamente o momento errado para Eiji Okamura, um jovem fotógrafo do Japão, de coração puro, chegar em Nova York e travar conhecimento de Ash Lynx… e ao seu lado, ser atraído para dentro de um redemoinho sangrento de orgulho, ganância, luxúria e ira desencadeada pelo enigma de codinome Banana Fish.

description.en:
When I opened my eyes, I thought it was going to be the common cliché of 'Transmigrating into a webnovel's world as the main character', but this story hadn't been written. The life of the main character Lee Hwan, the setting, the other characters. None of it!

God—the author—told me, "My style of writing webnovels is going to be very different from how your people do it."

Wait a second! This is way too different!!!
description.pt-br:
Quando abri meus olhos, pensei que estava em mais um clichê de “Transmigrar para o mundo de uma webnovel sendo o protagonista”, mas essa história não foi escrita. A vida do protagonista Lee Hwan, todo o roteiro, história e outros personagens não foram escritos, absolutamente nada foi escrito!!

Deus, o autor, me falou, “Meu estilo de escrita em webnovel é bem diferente do jeito que as pessoas fazem.”

description.en: Am I "necessary" in this world? What is the true nature of the person called "Mujina" who flies in the sky with a sword on her back in the midst of ordinary life? What is man, what is society, what are human rights, and what is happiness?
description.es: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?
description.ja: この世界に、私は”必要”かーー！？何気ない日常の中、刀を背に空を翔ぶ「ムジナ」と呼ばれる者の実体とは…？人間とは、社会とは、人権とは、そして幸せとは…
description.ru: История о юной девушке-убийце с катаной, которая охотится за своими целями в оживлённом столичном городе Цукумо.
description.es-la: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

altTitles.ja: シュガーアップル・フェアリーテイル

description.en: In a world where fairies are bought and sold to the highest bidder, humans aren’t exactly on friendly terms with the fae folk. But friendship is exactly what Anne Halford seeks with Challe, her new fairy bodyguard, though he’s not so keen on the idea. As his new master, Anne tasks him with escorting her through a particularly dangerous area, but with a reluctant bodyguard eager to escape a life of servitude, she’ll have to deal with a lot more than she bargained for…

title.en: A High School With Only Men

description.en:
"Are you the one who called me…?"

A black-haired beast looked at him with glowing yellow eyes.

"It’s okay. It won't hurt anymore. You'll be okay."

Estio was born as the youngest son of a farmer, but everyone hated him. He was a child who could read the hearts of people and animals. And…

"A cursed child."

He finally turned 19, and it was now time for his coming-of-age ceremony. Now starts Estio's journey to find happiness.

---
Estio is just an ordinary farmer's son, but with an extraordinary ability-he can read the thoughts and memories of humans and animals. For this, he is shunned by the people in his village, finding happiness only in his animal friends. After years of silently enduring the villagers' hostility, Estio runs away the night he turns 19. His journey brings unexpected friendships and encounters, but will such bonds be able to show him there is more to him and his ability than meets the eye?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.fr:
«Es-tu celui qui m'a appelé...?»

Une bête aux cheveux noirs l'a regardé avec des yeux jaunes brillants.

«Tout va bien. Ça ne fera plus mal. Tu vas t'en sortir.»

Éstio est né comme le plus jeune fils d'un fermier, mais tout le monde le détestait. C'était un enfant qui pouvait lire dans le cœur des gens et des animaux. Et...

«Un enfant maudit.»

Il a finalement eu 19 ans, et c'est maintenant le moment de sa cérémonie de passage à l'âge adulte. Maintenant commence le voyage d'Éstio pour trouver le bonheur.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.ko:
"날 부른 게... 당신입니까?"
까만 털의 짐승이 노랗게 빛나는 눈으로 그를 올려다보았다.
"이제 괜찮습니다. 더는 아프지 않을 겁니다. 괜찮으니까."

농가의 막내 아들로 태어난 소년 에스티오.
하지만 모든 사람들은 그를 미워했다.
사람과 동물들의 마음을 읽는 아이.
그리고...

"저주 받은 아이"

마침내 열아홉 살을 맞이한 성년식.
행복을 찾기 위한 에스티오의 여정이 지금 시작된다.

—

공든탑 작가님의 웹소설 인기작 <에스티오> 본격 웹툰화!
사람과 동물의 마음을 치유하는 여스티오의 여정에 함께 하세요!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.ru:
«Это ты звал меня?» Черношёрстный зверь смотрел на него снизу своими жёлтыми сияющими глазами. «Теперь всё хорошо. Больше не будет больно. Поэтому всё хорошо». Эстио – младший сын, рождённый в семье фермера. Но все люди его презирали. Он ребёнок, который читает души животных и людей. И… «Ребёнок, получивший проклятие». Наконец, церемония взросления, которая проводится, как только человеку исполняется 19 лет. И вот Эстио отправляется в путешествие, чтобы обрести своё счастье. По мотивам веб-романа известного писателя Кон Дынтхапа.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)

altTitles.en: The Story About a Monster Teaching Common Sense

description.en:
Itou-san, who’s poor at interpersonal relations, was jealous of her mild-mannered classmate Takahashi-san, who gets along well with everyone. But one day, she witnesses Takahashi-san swallow a person whole. Takahashi-san was a monster mimicking a human!

Such a terrifying monster was calmly blending in with the class – that’s extremely admirable!! I definitely want to be her friend!!

And so Itou-san learns the “normality” of human society from Takahashi-san the monster. But while Itou-san is in high spirits, Takahashi-san has her own motives…

A tag team between a prodigy author and the spirited illustrator behind “Youjo Senki” brings forth a thundering tale of maidens whose youthful impatience and yearning jumble together and accelerate! (Translated from the Bookwalker description for Volume 1.)

title.en: Mofutte ii no wa Omae dake

altTitles.ja: モフっていいのはお前だけ

description.en: Determined to defeat all canines, Shiro is a cute little white cat with a selfish attitude who’s unwillingly picked up off the streets by Kuro’s owner. Kuro is the large black dog who vows to protect Shiro, but one day after the two are all grown up, Shiro suddenly goes into heat!

altTitles.th: ราตรีที่ไร้เงา

description.en:
*Beware, for the shadow speaks.*

When junior knight Roselyn is rescued from the bottom of a cliff after an ambush by an enemy kingdom, her brother Calix is relieved – that is, until he learns that she's lost her memory. Now, she behaves like a child, eats like a horse, and wields unbelievable strength. But something's not quite right...

---
When you enter the deep forest, you will be devoured by the shadow. The shadow in the forest moves when no one is looking. In the deep forest, there is a shadow that mimics humans. The shadow speaks.

Rosalin of the White Night Chivalric Order went missing after suffering from an unexpected enemy attack during a hunting competition. They were able to find her unconscious and heavily wounded under a cliff, but when she woke up a few days later, she was rendered incapable of even simple speech due to acute amensia.

She roamed around the house, barefoot in her pyjamas, and spoke without honorifics. She would even eat food off the floor!

She’s bizarre, no matter how you look at it. Is this truly Rosalin?

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://ridibooks.com/books/809023066), [Volumes](https://ridibooks.com/books/809031210)

description.ja:
狩猟大会で敵国の襲撃を受けて行方不明になった｢白い夜｣騎士団のロゼリーン。 大怪我を負い、意識不明のロゼリーンが崖の下で発見されたが、数日後に目を…

description.th: ค่ำคืนในงานประลองล่าสัตว์ เกิดเหตุลอบสังหารเชื้อพระวงศ์ขึ้นโดยมีเป้าหมายคือ 'ริคาร์ดิส' เจ้าชายลำดับที่ 2 ทำให้อัศวินในหน่วยราตรีพิสุทธิ์ล้มตายมากรวมถึง 'โรซาลีน' แห่งตระกูลกงล้อสีชาดที่บาดเจ็บหนักด้วยเช่นกัน ในระหว่างที่นางกำลังนอนรอความตายนางก็ได้พบกับ 'เงา' นางจึงขอร้องให้ 'เงา' ช่วยสานต่อความตั้งใจของนางนั่นคือการปกป้อง 'นายท่านแห่งราตรีพิสุทธิ์' จึงเกิดเป็นพันธสัญญาต้องห้ามขึ้นมา
description.tr:
Ormanın derinlerine inerseniz acımasız gölge tarafından yakalanıp canlı canlı yenilirsiniz. İnsanların girmeye cesaret edemediği bu ormandaki gölge hareket eder, insanı taklit eder ve konuşur..
Beyaz Gece Şövalyelerinden Rosalin, bir av yarışması sırasında beklenmedik bir düşman saldırısına uğradıktan sonra ansızın kayboldu. Bir uçurumun altında baygın ve ağır yaralı hâlde bulundu. Birkaç gün sonra uyandığında ise akut amnezi (geçici hafıza kaybı) nedeniyle konuşamaz hâle geldi.
Evin içinde pijamalarıyla dolaşıyor, saygısızca konuşuyor, bir leydiye yakışmayacak hareketler yapıyordu. Yerden aldığı yemeği bile yiyecek duruma gelmişti!
Nereden bakarsanız bakın çok tuhaf biri olmuştu. Bu gerçekten Rosalin mi?

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://ridibooks.com/books/809023066), [Volumes](https://ridibooks.com/books/809031210)

[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/3885010321)

**Official Translations:**

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0002575)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/3127)
description.uk:
Розелін, лицар Білої ночі, зникла безвісти після того, як на неї напали ворожі сили під час мисливського змагання. Її знайшли без свідомості, поранену, лежачу під скелею. Розелін прокинулася через кілька днів та, здавалося, зовсім втратила пам’ять. Їй було важко говорити навіть простими словами. Дівчину знаходили босоніж у піжамі, неформально розмовляючи тут і там. Вона навіть збирала їжу з підлоги!

Вона дивна дівчина, як не глянь. Це справді Розелін?

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://ridibooks.com/books/809023066), [Volumes](https://ridibooks.com/books/809031210)

altTitles.ja: エンディング メーカー

altTitles.fr: Les Créateurs d'une Fin qui les Arrange

description.en:
After "outboxer009" wakes up in the body of Yuder Bayel from Legend of Heroes 2, he soon discovers that his rival "sandstorm" has also entered the game world as Cordelia Chace. 

These top-two-ranked old pros come to realize that navigating this game world is much harder than just pointing and clicking. With the apocalyptic conclusion of the game looming before them, they'll have to combine his quick wit, her foul mouth, and both their gamer mindsets to make a new, less cataclysmic ending.

Note: Chapter 1 very closely resembles the PROMO chapter.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltAlY-YQNvU)
description.ko:
게임 영웅전기2의 고이다 못해 썩은물인 두 사람.
만년 1등 '아웃복서009'와 만년 2등인 '노란폭풍'.
어느 날, 두 사람은 게임 속에서 눈을 뜨는데…….

“야… 너두?”
“야… 나두!”

영웅전기2의 결말은 세계의 멸망.

하지만 혼자가 아닌 둘이라면.
그것도 서버 랭킹 1위와 2위가 함께라면!

완벽한 해피 엔딩을 위한 썩은물들의 행보가 시작된다!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltAlY-YQNvU)
description.ru:
Два профессиональных игрока в игре "Легенда Героев 2": Кан Чжин Хо - Первый в мировом топе и Хон Ю Хи - вторая в мировом топе, однажды открыли глаза и оказались внутри своей любимой игры в телах игровых персонажей.

- Эй, и ты... тоже?

- Д-да, и я...

Финалом "Легенды Героев 2 " является разрушение человеческого мира. 
Однако, если они не одни... если топ 1 и топ 2 мира вместе... то... Они вновь пройдут по протоптанному пути с намерениями добиться "Хорошей Концовки"!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltAlY-YQNvU)
description.pt-br:
Dois heróis platinaram o jogo Legend of Heroes 2. Kang Jinho sendo o jogador top 1, e a Hong YuHee logo atrás no top 2. Um dia, eles abriram os olhos e se encontraram dentro do corpo de seus personagens desse jogo…

“Ei… você também?”

“Calma… por que você tá aqui?”

O fim de Legend of Heroes 2 era a destruição de toda a humanidade.

Mas se tiver dois deles que não estejam sozinhos e que sejam o top 1 e 2 do jogo, havia esperança.

E esse é o início de duas maçãs podres em busca de um final perfeito!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ltAlY-YQNvU)

description.en:
Want to diet? Want to train? School-girl body modification comedy!  
Join gyaru Sakura Hibiki and ojou Souryuuin Akemi as they lift weights and exercise with the help of macho-man Machio! Learn for yourself how good form, good diet and plenty of exercise will help with healthy living!! Let's muscle!!!
description.ru: Сакура Хибики - обычная старшеклассница, любящая покушать. Однажды ее подруга замечает, что Хибики поднабрала вес. Огорченная сим фактом, девушка пытается похудеть самостоятельно, но безуспешно. Решив раскошелиться ради великой цели, она направляется в спортзал, где встречает Мисс совершенство, по совместительству президента студсовета своей школы, Сорюин Акэми (у которой, как оказалось, есть небольшая странность). Теперь им вместе предстоит заниматься совершенствованием своих тел под надзором красавчика-тренера Матио.

description.en: Night, phenomena that were once known as natural disasters. Faced with the threat of inexplicable destruction, children offer their prayers in the form of dance in order to borrow the power of the gods, quell the Night's fury, and deliver the world from ruin. In a fateful encounter, a boy from a rural town in Japan, Jin, meets Gao, a British soldier who was forced to flee his homeland by the Night. The two spend their halcyon days with their friends in the quiet town surrounded by nature. Until one day, the Night suddenly falls on them once again!
description.ru: Ночь — феномен, некогда считавшийся природной катастрофой. Под угрозой уничтожения от не пойми чего, дети вознесли богам свои молитвы в форме танца, чтобы одолжить их силу, сдержать ярость Ночи и возродить мир из руин. По велению судьбы Дзин, парнишка из захолустного японского городка, встречает Гао, британского солдата, вынужденного покинуть свою страну из-за Ночи. Вдвоём они безмятежно проводили время вместе с друзьями в тихом городке в окружении природы. Пока однажды Ночь вновь не обрушилась на них!

title.en: The Ranker's Guide to Live an Ordinary Life

altTitles.en: A Guide to the Right Life for Rankers

description.en:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

altTitles.ja-ro: 人間やめたい米沢さん

description.en: Haru Yonezawa is an outstanding office manager who is looked up to by all his teammates. On the surface, he is cool and collected, never getting his feathers ruffled by his grouchy boss. But the truth is he has a secret hobby that, if anyone found out about would destroy his elite image. Every night, after a long, stressful day at work, he unwinds by dressing up and roleplaying... as a dog. Looking for a new master to help meet his needs, he calls upon a call girl, who shows up and is none other than one of his subordinates from work!

altTitles.th: รักบ๊องๆ ของยัยจอมป่วน

altTitles.ja: おバカちゃん、恋語りき

description.en: Since childhood, Neiro has been known for being good at fighting, making people fear her and giving her the title of Kansai's strongest woman. Wanting to find romance, she decides to transfer to a high school in Kanto. Instead, what faced her was a specially assembled class of delinquents.

title.en: Kono Bijutsubu ni wa Mondai ga Aru!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Bijutsubu Niwa Mondai Ga Aru!

altTitles.en: This Art Club Has a Problem!

altTitles.ru: С этим клубом точно что-то не так!

altTitles.ja: この美術部には問題がある！

description.en:
A girl with violently too much common sense, a boy whose sole ambition is to draw the perfect 2D bride, an addlebrained ghost member, and their always-sleeping president — what is *wrong* with this art club?!  
  
[Alternative Raw](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM01000007010000_68/)
description.ru: Это история о художественнм клубе старшей школы: о мальчике, отдающем свой талант рисованию "идеальных 2D-невест"; девочке, которая к нему неровно дышит; вечно спящем главе клуба; а также таинственной Колетт-сан и неопытной кураторше клуба. Все они странные и забавные люди, и с ними случаются странные и забавные происшествия.

description.en: Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.

Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

title.en: Duke Pendragon: Master of the White Dragon

altTitles.ja: 白龍公爵ペンドラゴン

altTitles.es-la: El Duque del dragón blanco: Pendragon

description.en:
Born as the successor of a low-ranking noble household, Raven Varte wears the sin of plotting a rebellion against the empire. To be granted amnesty, he was sent to fight demons alongside the worst corp of the empire, the ”Demon” corp. Most say that it is a place where most won’t survive for even a year, but Raven somehow managed to survive for ten. When his amnesty was in front of his eyes, on his last battlefield, he met the ‘Successor of the Pendragon Duke Household, Eren Pendragon.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)
description.ja:
下級貴族の次男として生まれたレイヴン・ヴァルトは反逆の汚名を着せられ、 赦免を見返りに最悪の部隊である"羅刹隊”で魔物と戦うことに。 大半は1年も生きることができないと言われる場所で、レイヴンは10年の歳月を生き延びた。 赦免を目前に控えたある日、最後の戦場でペンドラゴン公爵家の後継者であるエレン・ペンドラゴンと共に任務にあたるが…

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)
description.ko:
하급 귀족 가문의 차남으로 태어난 레이븐 발트.
반역에 연루되어 홀로 살아남은 그는
사면을 대가로 ‘악귀 부대’에서 싸우게 된다.

대부분이 1년을 버티지 못하는 곳에서
10년의 사면기간을 채울 때까지 살아남은 레이븐 발트.

사면을 목전에 둔 어느 날,
어려운 임무를 받고 팬드래건 공작가문의 후계자인
엘렌 팬드래건과 함께 임무에 투입되는데….

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)
description.ru:
Рэйвен Вальте, наследник малоизвестной аристократической семьи, обвиняется в бунтовщичестве против империи. У него есть выбор - ссылка, или смерть, и он выбирает ссылку. Его наказание - служба в войсках истребителей демонов, худшем военном подразделении в империи. Никто не верит, что Рейвен способен выжить там хотя бы год, но он приспосабливается и выживает до конца срока в десять лет. За несколько дней до амнистии он встречает на поле боя герцога Пендрагона, и происходит невероятное. 

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)

altTitles.th: ตำนานนักล่ามังกร

description.en: Ragna is a dragon hunter along with his partner, the strongest dragon hunter Leo. He didn't have much talent at hunting dragons but he had decided to entrust his whole life for her. However he was shown the feel of true despair by his future self on what would happen if he stays weak as he is now. With that, it seems that the reaper of the dragons had now appeared earlier than the original history, but will it be enough to change the future?
description.es: Ragna es un cazador de dragones junto con su compañera, la cazadora de dragones más fuerte, Leo. No tenía mucho talento para cazar dragones, pero había decidido confiar toda su vida a ella. Sin embargo, su yo del futuro le mostró la verdadera desesperación de lo que le ocurriría si seguía siendo tan débil como hasta ahora. Con eso, parece que la parca de los dragones ha aparecido antes que en la historia original, pero ¿será suficiente para cambiar el futuro?
description.pt:
Ragna é um caçador de dragões junto com sua parceira, a mais forte caçadora de dragões, Leo. Ele não tinha muito talento para caçar dragões, mas decidiu confiar toda a sua vida a ela. No entanto, foi mostrado a ele a sensação do verdadeiro desespero pelo seu próprio eu do futuro, sobre o que aconteceria se ele permanecesse fraco como ele é agora. Com isso, parece que o ceifador dos dragões apareceu mais cedo do que na história original, mas será isso o suficiente para mudar o futuro?  
  
**Links**:  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Artist’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/D_Koba)

No tenía mucho talento para cazar dragones, pero había decidido confiar toda su vida a ella. description.pt-br: Ragna é um caçador de dragões junto com sua parceira, a mais forte caçadora de dragões, Leo. Ele não tinha muito talento para caçar dragões, mas decidiu confiar toda a sua vida a ela. No entanto, foi mostrado a ele a sensação do verdadeiro desespero pelo seu próprio eu do futuro, sobre o que aconteceria se ele permanecesse fraco como ele é agora. Com isso, parece que o shinigami dos dragões apareceu mais cedo do que na história original, mas será isso o suficiente para mudar o futuro?

description.en:
Gods with everlasting lives. Sura who possess unrivaled power. And humans, caught helplessly in-between.  
When Kubera's peaceful village meets its fiery end, a mysterious magician named Asha comes to her rescue. Together they begin a journey in search of answers and revenge. Meanwhile across the realms, a web of entwined fates is growing tighter. One by one the other players of the game will emerge, each with their own agenda to pursue.  
At the center of this maelstrom stands Kubera, the girl with a god's name. Will this sixteen-year-old be the salvation of the world or its destruction?
description.it:
Dei immortali. Sura dai poteri impareggiabili. E gli umani, che si ergono fra loro impotenti.  
Quando il pacifico villaggio di Kubera incontra la sua fine, una misteriosa maga di nome Asha accorre in suo soccorso. Insieme intraprendono un viaggio in cerca di risposte e vendetta. Mentre attraversano il regno, una rete di destini intersecati sta nascendo… Una ad una le altre pedine della scacchiera emergono, ognuna all'inseguimento dei propri obiettivi.  
Al centro di quest'uragano si trova Kubera, la ragazza con il nome di un Dio. Questa sedicenne sarà la salvatrice di questo mondo… o la sua distruttrice?
description.pl:
Bogowie z nieśmiertelnymi żywotami  
Asury z niepojętą mocą  
I ludzie, pomiędzy nimi.  
Gdy wioska Kubery zostaje zniszczona, tajemniczy mag przychodzi jej na ratunek. Razem wyruszają w podróż w poszukiwaniu odpowiedzi i zemsty. Tymczasem pomiędzy wymiarami pajęczyna przeznaczenia coraz ciaśniej zaciska się… Jeden po drugim nowi gracze wkraczają na scenę, mając swoje własne powody. Historia młodej dziewczyny, która traci wszystko i zaczyna żyć zemstą.

title.en: The Blue Eye of Horus: The Story of a Queen Dressed as a Man

altTitles.it: La Regina d'Egitto: l'occhio azzurro di Horus

altTitles.pl: Oko Horusa: Kobieta, która została faraonem

altTitles.ja-ro: Aoi Horus no Hitomi: Dansou no Joou no Monogatari

altTitles.ja: 碧いホルスの瞳 -男装の女王の物語-

altTitles.zh: 碧蓝的荷鲁斯之眼~男装女王物语~

altTitles.zh-hk: 碧藍的荷魯斯之眼~男裝女王物語~

description.en:
It's the beginning of a new era in the Egypt of pharaohs, the marriage of the young Hatshepsut to her half-brother Seti ensures his rise to Pharaoh, under the name of Thutmose II.

Ambassadors of the gods on Earth, they shine to their people and seem at first glance like the perfect couple. However, under her mask of a perfect wife, Hatshepsut hides a deep rage… She doesn't want to accept the restrictions others try to place on her as a woman, she wants to become the Pharaoh, like her father!  
 
---

*Loosely based on the actual [historical figure](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hatshepsut).*
On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...

altTitles.zh-ro: Ai Yu Sha Yi Zhi Ye

altTitles.en: Night of Love and Murderous Intent

description.en: A decade ago, he was a beta at the pinnacle of his assassin career. But one day, while trying to save an Alpha child, he suffered severe injuries leading him to lose the sharpness and insight an assassin needs. Left with no choice, he retired and moved into a remote small town to start a new life under a new identity. Everything was going well until an unexpected visitor showed up at his house. The child he had saved years ago has now grown into the leader of an organization, and he’s coming after the beta with a powerful intent—
